Elvas is easily reached by bus, often from Evora.

Elvas is very close to Badajoz,Spain and has been fortified at different times. That makes it worth while to wander round looking at the work of different periods.

The old aqueduct is a great architectural view - five stories in parts - and it's staggering to see how narrow was its channel.

value: name=Pousada de Elvas - Santa Luzia, Charming Hotel

Today, this charming hotel in Elvas offers its guests not only all possible comfort but also the best Alentejo cuisine, especially the renowned bacalhau dourado (golden codfish), or its famous dish of pork trotters in a coriander marinade.

value: name=Hotel D. Luis Elvas, 3 star hotel

content=Beautifully situated in a "castle city", the Hotel D. Luis Elvas provides you a starting point inside the walls of Elvas to visit a region rich in culture and history. This 3 star Hotel one of the first hotels to flourish in Elvas is perfect for holidays or short breaks. The Hotel has 85 rooms, with private bathroom. Garden, Outdoor swimming pool, bar with terrace, 24-Hour front desk, Living Room, Daily Newspapers
